title: BH Core Carbon upgrades adaptable road & gravel e-bikes with smoother power
content:
BH upgrades their Core road and gravel e-bike family in new Carbon frameset models powered by a new smoother 2EXMAG motor with a tiny bit more support, but a much more natural feel across all types of road surfaces.
